body:
Hey guys, I just released episode #2 | Tools
Enjoy! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6k4F0m5kWLo

I had to use my trackpad at the end because my mouse decided to not work..

replies.body: I am so gonna use it ! Looks beautiful, but maybe make the swords a bit longer ?

- The top nubs on the hoe and axe didn't seem to be lined up with the handles. Might just be me
